title: EIPIP Meeting 91
body:
# Date and Time

Oct 04, 2023 at 14:00 UTC
# Location

Zoom: TBA in the Discord #eip-editing channel

YouTube Live Stream/Recording: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxpLrRIkDlBjDUUrGgF91pQw

# Agenda
### 1. Discuss Open Issues/PRs, and other topics


#### Changes to `Final` proposals
- [x] https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/7806
- [x] https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/7423

Manual Merge
- [x] https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/7505
- [x] https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/7506



### 2. Discussion continued or updates from past meetings
- [x] https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/7550 
- [x] Call for Input 
  - Issues 263-270 & 272-273: Due on Oct 6th
  - Issues 274-275: Due on Oct 13th
- [x] Repo split - [EIP-7329](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7329)
  - Updates from the Editors' meeting
  - [ ] https://hackmd.io/A1zfRkO7RKKV6BIaSXpcbw


### 3. EIPs Insight - Monthly EIPs status reporting.
- [Hackmd](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/EthereumImprovementProposalsInsight/https%3A%2F%2Fhackmd.io%2F%40poojaranjan%2FEIPsInsightSeptember2023)
- [EIPsInsight.com](https://eipsinsight.com/insight/2023/9)

### 4. [EIP Editing Office Hour](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/EIPEditingOfficeHour)
- Agenda [Meeting 26](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/277)


### 5. Review action items from earlier meetings
- [Summary meeting 90](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/271#issuecomment-1728151133)

### 6. Announcement
[ERC@Devconnect](https://medium.com/ethereum-cat-herders/erc-devconnect-2023-4c343289b3cb)
Can we add EIP/ERC split update to the agenda? https://hackmd.io/A1zfRkO7RKKV6BIaSXpcbw ?

## Summary 

### 1. Discuss Open Issues/PRs, and other topics
#### https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/7806
- @Pandapip1 brought the item for discussion suggesting there isn't a process for `Superseding`.
- @lightclient agreed it was a bit complicated in the past and is discontinued. And the PR should be closed. 
- PandaPip proposed if this can be allowed under "Security consideration"?
- Matt found it generally reasonable. He also brought up the point of consideration for an author to add a status `Final-Deprecated`.
- Pandpip: `Final-Withdrawn`
- @xinbenlv  said that `Final-Superseded` will be good in the context of ERCs. 
- It's worth following the discussion on the recording.

**Decision**
- Panda will draft a PR to add a field "Superseded by" in the Preamble.
- It will be discussed in the following meeting.
- Keep the PR open. 

#### https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/7423
- Approved by editors and merged. 

### Manual Merge

#### https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/7505
- Approved in the last meeting. 
- @lightclient wants to take another look before merging.
- Panda (who missed the last meeting) also approved.

#### https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/7506
- Approved in earlier meetings. 
- Merged.

 ### 2. Discussion continued or updates from past meetings
 #### https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/7550
 **Call for Input**
- The due date is Oct 6th, so we have some time for editors to respond to Call for Action. 
- PandaPip brought up #266 for discussion mentioning unavailability of an author may block decision-making. The way the current charter is set up, the involvement of every author is needed. He further proposed to have an "Intermediate Editor"?
- agreeing to that @g11tech said getting feedback in the first week of Issues will be ideal to speed up the process.  
- Without Axic voting, there is no way to have the first "keeper of the consensus".
- Matt and other editors are respectful of Axic's interest to continue to contribute but there were discussion of having a "special status editor" or delegate vote. 
- It seems the proposal will not pass, no decision on the call, will be communicated at the next meeting. 
  

#### Repo split - [EIP-7329](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-7329)
- PandaPip proposed meeting time as next Oct 11th at 1400 UTC. 
- May reach out to all editors async to plan the meeting given Sam is on vacation till 17th. 
- He further shared a "last minute change" to splitting the repo wrt "EIP Type". 
- Victor: Interface may go closer to ERC. Wondering about the placeholder for Interface and similar EIPs.
- Matt: Interface and networking to be deprecated.
- Gajinder: EIPs requiring hardfork will be `Core` and rest all not with Core EIPs. Also, decided to deprecate categories. 
- Panda: will update the related Call For Input Issue.
- Danno - The Developer audience is more important to draw the line for EIPs categories. 
- The networking group works well with the Client dev group and should be excluded from the ERC group. 
- The subdomain erc.ethereum.org is ready. Just waiting to set up the correct files. 
- Panda wants to try to separate the repo. Matt is pretty against that but open to look into the Pull Request.
- Worth following the discussion. 
We ran out of time, the discussion will be continued on the Discord.
